description.@en: You have a tendency of one-upmanship, are rather prickly and frankly, bossy. When things don’t go your way in a fight, you grow irritated, which only further pushes you towards embracing your Chaos Alignment.

data.effects: Whenever you roll Chaos Dice to determine if you Injure a foe and fail to do so, move one step down the Peril Condition Track negatively while suffering 1 Corruption.
